mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY name ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET name=#{c.name} WHERE categoryId=#{c.categoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.name, c.categoryId, COUNT(c.name) as c FROM CATEGORY c INNER JOIN CATEGORY_PLACE cp on c.categoryId = cp.fk_categoryId INNER JOIN PLACE p on cp.fk_placeId = p.placeId GROUP by c.name UNION SELECT cc.name, cc.categoryId, COUNT(cc.name) as c FROM CATEGORY cc INNER JOIN CATEGORY_TOUR ct on cc.categoryId = ct.fk_categoryId INNER JOIN TOUR t on ct.fk_tourId = t.tourId GROUP by cc.name) as t ORDER BY t.c DESC
